item.title: Akeredolu In State Of Extreme Incapacity
item.description: The National Chairman of the All Progressives Congress (APC), Abdullahi Adamu, on Monday, during a meeting with APC state chairmen revealed that Ondo State Governor, Rotimi Akeredolu is hospitalized abroad and in a state of “extreme incapacity”. Akeredolu had initiated a 21-day leave on June 7, intending to return on July 6. However, he has since extended his medical leave, updating the state house of Assembly on his situation. Adamu while speaking on Akeredolu’s state of health said, “We regret to announce the extreme incapacity of the Governor of Ondo state who we understand has been hospitalised overseas.

item.title: Frank Bank - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Late television star who twice played Lumpy Rutherford on the television series, Leave It to Beaver. Before Fame He had his first uncredited acting role in the 1950 film, Cargo to Capetown. Trivia He acted in the TV movies, Life with Archie and High School U.S.A. Family Life He was married to his third wife, Rebecca Fink, from 1982 until his death. Associated With He was a regular panelist on the Match Game opposite host Gene Rayburn in 1983.

item.title: Wednesday Addamss Thanksgiving Speech, Explained
item.description: Wednesday Addams’s famous Thanksgiving Day speech goes into how the Native Americans were and are actually treated by pilgrims and their descendants. The Gist: Wednesday Addams delivers her famous Thanksgiving speech while playing the role of Pocahantas in a Camp Pageant called A Turkey Named Brotherhood.This speech is not only an example of Wednesday standing up for others, but an extremely apt social commentary that’s still relevant today, 30 years after the Addams Family Values released.

item.title: What Are The Parent Test Parenting Styles?
item.description: ABC's 'The Parent Test' explores 12 different parenting styles. Let's find out more about each one. Many moms and dads would claim their parenting style trumps all others. Whether you’re overprotective or more loosey-goosey, we all try our darndest to do right by our kids. Now, ABC's The Parent Test is here to examine the notion that one parenting style is the best. Article continues below advertisement The show’s synopsis explains that The Parent Test is based on a TV show from Australia and looks to “explore the many distinctively different parenting styles.

item.title: Brenna D'Amico - ge, Famille, Biographie
item.description: À propos Actrice, elle a fait ses débuts à l'écran dans le film de Disney Channel intitulé "Descendants". Elle y a incarné le rôle de Jane. Elle a repris son rôle dans "Descendants 2" en 2017 et "Descendants 3" en 2019. Elle a également joué dans la websérie de Brat intitulée "Overnights". Avant la gloire Elle a étudié à des ateliers aux LA Casting Director Workshops et a fait des improvisations dès 2012.

item.title: Davido Donates 250m To 292 Orphanages Across Nigeria
item.description: Award-winning Nigerian singer, Davido has revealed beneficiaries of his promise to disburse ₦250m to 292 orphanages across the country. Recall that Davido days before his birthday had asked his friend and colleagues to donate one million Naira each. The singer within hours received ₦200m from his friends and colleagues in the industry to the amazement of social media users. Davido thereafter added ₦50m to the initial ₦200m which was donated by his friends and disclosed that he would donate it to orphanages in Nigeria.

item.title: Suspected Bandits Kidnap School Children In Ekiti, Leaves Bus Empty
item.description: A yet-to-be-identified group of criminals suspected to be bandits have whisked away an unspecified number of school children in Ekiti State. A viral video seen online by Naija News showed a school bus emptied with the driver and supposed school children all missing. Residents would be seen lamenting the growing insecurity in the region as they inspect the school bus with different emotions. A netizen [@dammiedammie35] who shared a video clip of the incident online, alleged that the kids were abducted while going to Eporo Ekiti from Emure Ekiti in their school bus on Monday morning.

item.title: Twin Poses for His Brother's Yearbook Picture
item.description: These two twins figured out a genius way to pull off a yearbook prank that could never be topped. It's probably the best yearbook prank of all time. Growing up I always dreamed of having a clone so we could have each other's backs. If I wanted to play hookie and sneak into a movie matinee, then my clone could cover for me when I went to class. If he wanted to be a real bad boy, he could enjoy family dinners while I chilled underneath my bed and read comic books.

item.title: Another INEC Office Set Ablaze In Abia
item.description: The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) office in Ohafia Local Government Area of Abia state has been set ablaze. Confirming the sad incident in a statement on Monday, INEC spokesman, Festus Okoye, said the incident occurred on Sunday night. He said that the building which was recently renovated was burnt down, adding that apart from furniture items, all electoral materials and office equipment were destroyed. Okoye, however, noted that there are no casualties on the part of the staff on guard duty, saying that the matter has been reported to the police for investigation.

item.title: FG Approves N1bn For NDLEA To Buy Lie Detectors, Night Vision Goggles
item.description: The Muhammadu Buhari-led government has approved N1 billion for the National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) to procure lie detectors and night vision goggles. Naija News reports that the Attorney General of the Federation and Minister of Justice, Abubakar Malami, made this known while briefing State House correspondents after the Federal Executive Council (FEC) meeting chaired by President Muhammadu Buhari on Wednesday. Malami said the council approved the procurement of the gadgets for the narcotic agency to enhance their performance in curbing illicit drugs in the country.

item.title: Inspekta Mwala's actor Davis Mwambili fined KSh 30k after accident in which one died
item.description: Davis Mwabili, popularly known as Inspekta Mwala, was on Thursday, September 19, found guilty of causing death by dangerous driving by a Mariakani court. Mariakani senior principal magistrate Nelly C. Adalo sentenced the comedian to one year in jail or pay KSh 30,000 fine. READ ALSO: 5 unique animals spotted in Kenya's wild that amazed the world READ ALSO: Tob Cohen: Pathologists agree to release postmortem results at a later date Mwabili, who features in popular TV drama series, Inspekta Mwala, however, paid the KSh 30, 000 fine to secure his freedom, K24 reported.

item.title: Ungefanya nini iwapo ungegundua mpenzi wako huwa haoshi vyombo vyake? Wanawake Wakenya wajibu
item.description: Wanawake wengi huapa kwamba hawawezi kuishi na mwanamme mchafu asiyetilia maanani usafi wake. Wengine husema endapo wapenzi wao ni wachafu, watajitolea kushughulikia chochote kinachohusu usafishaji. Hata hivyo, ni rahisi kusema haya kuliko kutenda maadamu watu hutoroka pindi wanapokumbana na jamaa asiyejali na mchafu. Habari Nyingine: Kutana na mwanamke mrembo Mkorino anayewakosesha wanaume usingizi Hebu fikiria, mpenzi wako anakualika kwake adhuhuri moja. Unaingia jikoni mwake na unapata mlima wa vyombo vichafu ambavyo vimekaa pale kwa wiki moja au hata zaidi.

item.title: If Schadenfreude Is Your Thing, 'Kings of Pain' Might Be Your New Favorite Show
item.description: Here's everything you need to know about History Channel's latest series, 'Kings of Pain'. How does the show work and who is in it? Details inside. Source: History ChannelThe History Channel's latest show, Kings of Pain, is an eight-part docuseries that follows wildlife biologist Adam Thorn and professional animal handler Rob "Caveman" Alleva as they sacrifice their bodies for science and TV viewers' pleasure. Keep reading for everything you need to know about the Kings of Pain show.

item.title: Johnnyphlo - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Korean-American rapper and businessman whose impact on the music industry was initially felt when he co-founded Treble & Bassment Records, which birthed the careers of pop stars like Ailee. He broke out as a rapper in 2010 with the release of the album Basic Strategy. Before Fame He first fell in love with rap after hearing a mix CD at age thirteen. He began writing his own raps shortly thereafter.

item.title: Maelezo yakushangaza yaibuka kuhusu MAUAJI ya mwanasheria wa Mumias
item.description: - Ufichuzi mpya unaashiria kuwa mauaji ya mwanasheria wa Kampuni ya Sukari ya Mumias, Ronald Lubya yalikuwa ya kisiasa - Lubya anadaiwa kusakwa na kuuawa baada ya kukosa kutia saini barua za kuruhusu kuingizwa kwa sukari nchini kimagendo kutoka Sudan - Sukargi hiyo hatimaye ingepakiwa kwenye karatasi za sukari ya Mumias na kusambazwa sokoni ili kufadhili kampeni Ufichuzi mpya unaashiria kuwa mauaji ya mwanasheria wa Kampuni ya Sukari ya Mumias, Ronald Lubya yalikuwa ya kisiasa.

item.title: Properties Destroyed As Fire Guts Three Buildings In Lagos (Video)
item.description: Fire has gutted three-storey buildings and destroyed properties worth millions of naira in the Docemo area of Idumota, Lagos State. In a statement via its official X handle, the Lagos State Fire and Rescue Service said it received a distress call about the fire incident around 7:40 am, and emergency services swiftly mobilized. It stated that upon arrival at the scene, it was discovered that the fire had gutted three buildings, including two two-story structures and one three-story building, adding that firefighting efforts were underway.

item.title: "More Nigerians Would Be Thrown Under The Poverty Bus"
item.description: The Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) says the naira withdrawal limit recently announced by the Central Bank of Nigeria would bring more hardship to citizens of the country, particularly the masses. The NLC through its president, Ayuba Wabba said the implementation of the policy is ill-timed because most rural areas do not have technological facilities to support transactions of such type of business activities. He said some local government areas in some states at the moment do not even have functional banking services and have to rely heavily on cash transactions to carry out day-to-day business activities.

item.title: Bree Wasylenko - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Choreographer, dancer, and instructor well known for her role as as Kate on the hit Family Channel series The Next Step. She competed on the third season of So You Think You Can Dance Canada.  Before Fame She trained in numerous styles of dance growing up, including jazz, tap, ballet, and contemporary. She worked as an assistant on So You Think You Can Dance Canada in seasons 1, 2, and 4.

item.title: Clinton Cave - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Guitarist, vocalist, saxophonist, and producer for the Australian alternative pop-rock band Chase Atlantic. The band's YouTube channel has earned over 1.4 million subscribers. They signed with Warner Brothers Records. In 2017, they released the hit song "Church." Before Fame He launched his own YouTube channel called Clinton Cave Music.  Trivia His Instagram has a following of more than 260,000 fans and growing. Family Life He is joined in Chase Atlantic by his younger brother Mitchel Cave.

item.title: Dr Heavenly Kimes bio: age, net worth, husband, house, pregnancy
item.description: Dr Heavenly Kimes is an award-winning Atlanta-based dentist, businesswoman, author, inspirational speaker, realtor, and reality TV star. She became famous after she began featuring in Bravo's reality show Married To Medicine. Dr. Kimes owns a dental practice in Metro Atlanta called Smiles by Dr. Heavenly, and she is the CEO of Heavenly Dental Associates, Inc. She also owns a brand of dental products called SmileChangers. She is not only successful in her career, but she is also happily married with children and three dogs.

item.title: Erika Choperena - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Became known as soccer star Antoine Griezmann's wife. She ran her own beauty blog until Antoine's fame got in the way of the site and deactivated it. Before Fame She met Antoine while studying education in college in San Sebastian, Spain. Trivia She and Antoine speak different languages. She is a native Spanish speaker while Antoine speaks French. Family Life She and Antoine started dating in 2011 and would marry in 2017.

item.title: Is It Possible to Play PowerWash Simulator in VR?
item.description: 'PowerWash Simulator' is a relaxing game for anyone itching to blast away dirt for hours. It supports controller and mouse and keyboard, but can you play it in VR? Source: FuturLabIn recent years, a slew of niche simulator games tasking players with completing ordinary activities has gained a cult following. Through cutting grass in Lawn Mowing Simulator or growing crops in Farming Simulator, fans have latched onto these games to unwind and gain a kernel of satisfaction during their free time.

item.title: Trent Olsen biography: who is the secretive Olsen sibling?
item.description: Trent Olsen is an ex-actor and comic book writer from California, United States of America. He is the older brother of the Olsen twins and the Marvel superhero movie star Elizabeth Olsen. Though the Olsen brother quit acting many years ago, he still has a great career in Hollywood. Trent went into acting early in life, but unlike his famous sisters, his career was shortlived, with very few acting credits. He still works in the film industry, just not in performance art.

item.title: Who Are Jason Kidd's Parents? A Blast to the Past
item.description: Who Are Jason Kidd's Parents? The Family Who Built the NBA Superstar"My dad was a big part of my life. Not just being a father, but he was like a teammate," Jason Kidd said of his dad. By Alizabeth SwainMay 2 2024, Published 4:53 p.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesIn the realm of professional basketball, few names resonate as powerfully as that of Jason Kidd. A maestro on the court, his rise to NBA fame is a tale of talent, perseverance, and the undeniable influence of his upbringing.

item.title: Kirk Cameron - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known for his time as a child actor, he played the role of Mike Seaver on the television show Growing Pains. In 2019, he portrayed himself in a guest role on the series Fuller House.  Before Fame He graduated from high school a year early with high honors. Trivia He portrayed Cameron Williams in Fireproof. Family Life He married Chelsea Noble in 1991, a fellow Growing Pains star. Together they have six children, including Olivia Rose.

item.title: Man Rescues Dog Drowning In Frozen Lake, Owner Does Nothing
item.description: Stranger Saves Dog Drowning in Frozen Lake, Owner Stands by and Does NothingBy Mustafa GatollariPublished Feb. 15 2023, 3:08 p.m. ET Source: GettyActs of heroism don't occur at convenient times. I'm pretty sure that Spider-Man was prairie dogging bad with a rumbling stomach when he stopped criminals from stealing an old woman's purse, or that he was in the middle of disputing a fraudulent charge on Peter Parker's debit card when his Spider-Sense began tingling from a pumpkin bomb tossed by Green Goblin from out of nowhere.

These 20 Gifts Will Make Any Dungeons and Dragons Fan's Day
item.description: There are so many accessories any Dungeons and Dragons fan could want to spice up gameplay, but these 20 gifts are a good start for the fan in your life. Source: AmazonBetween Stranger Things, Baldur's Gate 3, and Critical Role, there are plenty of new entry points for Dungeons and Dragons players to get into the long-running tabletop RPG. There's a plethora of accessories and knick-knacks targeted toward these players, but what should you actually get them for a gift?

item.title: How Retired Army General Stopped Atiku From Giving Wike VP Ticket
item.description: A retired Army General from a state in the North-Western part of the country reportedly influenced the decision not to pick Governor Nyesom Wike of Rivers State as the running mate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) presidential candidate, Atiku Abubakar. It was gathered that some conservative Northern elements in the party had prevailed on Atiku to drop Wike despite promising to give him the running mate ticket just after the presidential primary of the PDP.

item.title: Lisette Alexis - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Professional actress, dancer and singer who was one of the stars of the 2019 short film Feint. She has also choreographed her own performances at Disneyland and at a benefit for HALO Dance for Autism. Before Fame She began dancing when she was 14 years old and acted in local theater productions. Trivia She's building a fan base on Instagram where she posts lifestyle photos and song clips for 6,000 followers.

item.title: Ted Lasso Season 3 Review: The Final Season?
item.description: 'Ted Lasso' Will Never Be Relegated in Our Hearts, Even If Season 3 Is Its LastBy Jamie LernerPublished March 14 2023, 9:00 a.m. ET Source: Apple TV Plus(L-R): Brett Goldstein, Brendan Hunt, and Jason Sudeikis in 'Ted Lasso' Season 3 We all want to “Believe” that Ted Lasso won’t disappoint us in its (supposed) final season. And luckily for us, it doesn’t. The cock-eyed optimists we’ve all become, thanks to Jason Sudeikis’ Ted, are still cheering for AFC Richmond and all the characters who surround the club.

item.title: Tobi Amusan Wins Gold For Nigeria In African Games In Ghana
item.description: Tobi Amusan won gold in the 100-meter hurdles at the ongoing 2024 All-African Games in Accra, Ghana. The fastest woman in the world of track and field won the 100m hurdle event at the all-African Games for Nigeria within 12.89 seconds, which is one of his slowest finish. Tobi Amusan won her first gold medal in the All-African Games in Brazzaville, Congo, in 2015. She won her second gold medal at the event in Rabat, Morocco in 2019.

item.title: BREAKING! Senate Confirms Amaechi's As Minister (Video)
item.description: Rotimi Amaechi's nomination as a minister of the Federal Republic of Nigeria has been approved after being screened by the Nigerian Senate. The former Rivers state governor and director general of the 2015 All Progressives Congress (APC) presidential campaign organisation, was approved after a series of questions had been asked by senators. [article_adwert] There was mild drama at the beginning of the session as the minority leader, Senator Godswill Akpabio said that the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) caucus had no questions for the nominee, and this was immediately corroborated by the Senate leader, Ali Ndume, who asked Amaechi to take a bow and go.

item.title: Naira Marley Trends As Mohbad Is Buried
item.description: Nigerian singer, Naira Marley has become a topic of conversation among netizens following the burial of fast-rising singer, Mohbad who allegedly died from an ear infection on Tuesday. This comes after a video of the late singer surfaced on X (formerly Twitter) in which Mohbad had cried out saying that Marlian Music owned by Naira Marley should be held responsible if he dies. “Because of this issue now you are trying to kill me.

item.title: Tears As Fast-Raising DJ Drowns Hours After Uploading Beach Photos
item.description: A fast-rising Disc jockey simply known as Michelle has reportedly died hours after posting beach photos. Her friends took to their social media to mourn her death. According to them, the promising female entertainer drowned while at the beach. Sharing the sad news to fans and friends, Michelle’s sister, Stella Besin wrote; ”I’m in shock. God don’t let this be the end. I need a miracle right now. My sister can’t be gone.

item.title: We Won't Allow Anyone To Ruin Osinbajo's Reputation
item.description: A plot to smear the reputation of Vice-President Yemi Osinbajo has been alleged by his campaign council, Naija News reports. The media council in a statement on Monday claimed that a US-based Nigerian is leading a group of smear campaigners to tarnish the image of the vice president. According to the council, the smear group is planning to cast the Vice President, who is a Christian, as a religious fanatic while he was a commissioner in Lagos State.

In 2018, she toured with singer Rita Ora. Before Fame One of her earliest hits with OnRecords was the 2014 single "Rikthejm na," which featured Mc Kresha. Trivia She has grown extremely popular on social media, earning upwards of 2 million dedicated followers on her Instagram account.

item.title: Nigerian US soldier kidnapped and killed after he came back to Imo state for Christmas (photos)
item.description: A Nigerian US soldier has been kidnapped and killed after he came to his hometown in Imo state to see his family and celebrate Christmas. According to the Facebook user, Lilian Ndiukwu, who shared the tragic story, her elder brother who is a veteran US soldier came home to celebrate Christmas in Imo state but he was abducted and killed. item.title: TJ Hunt - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Car aficionado and social media star known for his car-centric YouTube channel, where he uploads a variety of videos, including car reviews. Collectively, the videos on his channel have gone on to receive over 613 million views. Before Fame He started uploading to his channel in November of 2009. Trivia He has more than 2.1 million subscribers to his channel and 950,000 followers on Instagram. He has a clothing line named Hunt & Co.

item.title: Femi Adebayo Reveals What He 'Sacrificed' To Make Jagun Jagun Movie
item.description: Nollywood actor cum filmmaker, Femi Adebayo has opened up on the extra length it took him to make indigenous movie,  Jagun Jagun. The actor during an interview with the press disclosed that he sold his properties to fund the movie because he didn’t want to seek help from financial institutions and individuals. Adebayo said Jagun Jagun is a multi-billion Naira project, though, he did not disclose the exact amount he spent on funding the project.

Makima's Devil Powers Are One of the Biggest Twists in the 'Chainsaw Man' Manga so Far
item.description: What devil contract does Makima have in the 'Chainsaw Man' manga? Makima is one of the most enigmatic characters in the story so far. Source: MAPPASpoiler alert! This article contains major plot points for the Chainsaw Man manga. As both a macabre award-winning manga and an equally-acclaimed anime series, Chainsaw Man has easily become one of the hottest Shōnen Jump stories of the past few years. The story follows Denji, an impoverished young man who tries to pay off his crippling debt by becoming a devil hunter.

item.title: Soludo, Uba, Others Ask Buhari To Release Nnamdi Kanu
item.description: At least nine governorship candidates in the November 6 Anambra election have asked President Muhammadu Buhari to order the release of the leader of the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), Nnamdi Kanu. Naija News reports that the candidates are Charles Soludo (APGA); Andy Uba (APC); Ifeanyi Ubah (YPP); Ben Etiaba (AA); Obinna Uzoh (SDP); Akachukwu Nwankpo (ADC); Onyejegbu Okwudili (APM); Nnamdi Nnawuo (PRP) and Obiora Okonkwo (ZLP). In a  joint statement released on Tuesday, the candidates stated that the release of the IPOB leader will bring lasting peace to Anambra and the South East as a whole.

item.title: Bill Cosby - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Stand-up comedian who became known for starring on his own sitcom The Cosby Show, which aired from 1984 to 1992. He later created the comedy series Fat Albert and the Cosby Kids.  Before Fame After flunking 10th grade, he worked as an apprentice at a local shoe repair shop and began performing stand up comedy at The Hungry I nightclub in San Francisco. While attending Temple University, he worked as a bartender at a Philadelphia club called The Cellar.

item.title: Chef Hilda Baci Sets New Record, Completes 100 Hours Of Marathon Cooking
item.description: Nigerian chef, Hilda Baci has broken her own record and set a new one by completing 100 hours of non-stop cooking by a single individual. Naija News reports that based on her 96-hour target, Chef Baci was initially scheduled to stop cooking at 4 pm today (Monday). However, instead of stopping, she pressed on with the cook-a-thon competition taking place at the Amore Gardens, Lekki, and the 27-year-old has now set a new milestone.

Trivia She has a YouTube channel where she posted a popular video called "Pranking girls saying we're there bf side chick.

item.title: "Gay" Dog From Animal Shelter Gets Adopted by a Gay Couple
item.description: A Celebration Is in Order Because the "Gay" Dog Got Adopted by a Gay CoupleBy Allison DeGrushePublished March 24 2022, 3:31 p.m. ET Source: WCCB CharlotteIn an inhumane act of callousness, an adorable little pup was abandoned at a local animal shelter in North Carolina over claims that he was "being gay." According to WCCB Charlotte, a Facebook post stated that the former owners surrendered the dog after he humped another male dog — seriously?

item.title: Buhari Meets Libyan Prime Minister In Aso Rock
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Wednesday met with Prime Minister of the Libyan Government of National Unity, Abdul Hamid Dbeibeh, in the Presidential Villa, Abuja. Naija News reports that Buhari and his aides received Hamid Dbeibeh and members of his entourage at the forecourt of the Presidential Villa at about 10.05 a.m. Nigeria’s president was also joined to receive the Libyan PM at the forecourt of the villa by cabinet members including the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Geoffrey Onyeama, as well as some presidential aides.

He has been in the industry for over a decade and has won a couple of awards. So, who exactly is Jake Short? Have a look at Jake's biography, and you will learn more about this amazing actor. item.title: Kwara Govt Cancels 3-Day Working Week, Orders Workers To Resume Normal 5-Days Working Week
item.description: The Kwara State government has reversed the 3-day working week instruction given to civil servants in the wake of the fuel subsidy removal by the President Bola Tinubu administration. The state government in a fresh directive by the Head of Service in a letter dated June 26, 2023 and addressed to the Heads of Ministries, Departments, and Agencies (MDAs) ordered civil servants to revert to the normal five days working week as from July 10.

item.title: 'You Are A Busybody Seeking Public Attention'
item.description: The Yoruba Leadership and Peace Initiative (TYLPI) has berated renowned Islamic Cleric Abubakar Ahmad Gumi over his recent trip to Igboho town in Oyo State. Naija News had reported that Gumi alongside the former Executive Secretary of the Nigerian Health Insurance Scheme, Usman Yusuf, had visited the town last week, calling on Yoruba Nation agitators to shelve their agitation for secession. The town is the adopted home of the embattled jailed Yoruba nation activist, Sunday Adeyemo, popularly known as Sunday Igboho.

item.title: Mjane wa Ken Okoth akubali matokeo ya DNA na kuzima uhasama na Anne Thumbi
item.description: Mjane na mpenziwe aliyekuwa Mbunge wa Kibra Ken Okoth, wamekubaliana kuwa marehemu alikuwa na mtoto. Kwa mujibu wa Nairobi News, Monica Okoth, na Anne Thumbi wameafikiana kwa kutia saini matokeo ya DNA, ambayo ilibainisha kuwa Okoth alikuwa babake mtoto wa kiume aliyekuwa amezua utata. Habari Nyingine: Hatimaye Gavana Joho avunja kimya chake kuhusu mkasa wa feri Likoni Habari Nyingine: Mwanamuziki Justin Bieber, afunga pingu za maisha kwa mara ya pili

item.title: Omoyele Sowore Meets Bail Condition, Send Message To Nigerians
item.description: The Publisher of SaharaReporters, Omoyele Sowore, and four others have met their bail conditions following charges of criminal conspiracy, unlawful assembly, and inciting public disturbance. Speaking to newsmen, Sowore thanked Nigerians for their support and show of love while in detention. The former presidential candidate of the AAC and co-covener of the RevolutionNow movement assured Nigerians that he would not give up until the country is finally and completely liberated.

item.title: Siaya: Lofa afurusha mashemeji kumletea mke wa pili
item.description: Kizaazaa kilizuka katika mtaa wa Ukwala, Siaya baada ya jamaa kuwatimua wakwe zake wa zamani akiwasuta kuwa matapeli. Semasema za mtaani zinaarifu kwamba lofa alikuwa amemuoa binti wa wazee hao lakini wawili hao walitengana baada ya kuzozana. Habari Nyingine: Kafyu: Msemaji wa polisi Charles Owino alaumu umma kwa kukiuka agizo Kwa mujibu wa Taifa Leo, jamaa alikasirishwa sana na wazee hao na kuwalaumu kwa kuvuruga ndoa yake sababu ya tamaa ya mali.

item.title: Ferdinand Magellan - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: Famous Portuguese explorer who sought a westerly route for spices. He planned the first successful expedition to circumnavigate the world. Before Fame Due to his family's heritage, he became the page to the Portuguese royal court after his parents' death. Trivia He was the first explorer to sail from the Atlantic to the Pacific Ocean. Family Life He had two children with his wife, Maria Caldera Beatriz Barbosa, the daughter of his friend Diogo Barbosa.

item.title: Northern Elders Blast Akeredolu Over Comment On 2023 Presidency
item.description: The Northern Elders Forum (NEF) has bombed Governor Rotimi Akeredolu of Ondo State over his comment on the 2023 presidency. Naija News reports that Akeredolu had claimed that any political party that fields a Northern presidential candidate in 2023 would lose the election. He maintained that in the spirit of fairness and justice, the person to succeed President Muhammadu Buhari should be a Southerner as the North would have completed eight straight years of leadership by 2023.

item.title: The Whole World Is Watching Us Archbishop Kaigama
item.description: The Catholic Archbishop of Abuja, His Grace Most Revd Ignatius Kaigama, says the Federal Government’s fight against bandits and insurgents is a litmus test for President Muhammadu Buhari’s administration and all eyes are on Nigeria. He stated this on Sunday while delivering his sermon at St. Augustine’s Church, Waru Pastoral Area, Abuja. According to Kaigama, it was critical that the Federal Government supported the security agencies in ending the killings and attacks by bandits in parts of the country.

item.title: What Does Crash Out Mean on TikTok? An Aggressive Trendy Term

item.title: 'I Once Felt Erection From My Father When I Hugged Him' Nollywood Actress
item.description: Nigerian broadcaster cum Nollywood actress, Katherine Obiang, has disclosed she once felt an erection when she hugged her father one morning. She disclosed this on the Jasiri show whilereacting to the trending video of movie director, Kunle Afolayan, dancing with his daughter, Eyiyemi. The video sparked mixed reactions online, with many saying the dance was too intimate and inappropriate for a father and daughter. Addressing the issue, Katherine disapproved of the dance, emphasizing that such incidents could end innocent interactions between a father and daughter.

Fuel Scarcity Imminent In North As IPMAN Begins Strike
item.description: The strike might be lead to the scarcity of Premium Motor Spirit, popularly called petrol in Abuja, Kaduna, Nasarawa, Kogi, Niger and neighbouring states, Naija News reports. IPMAN members embarked on strike on Monday to express their grievances against the Federal Government’s continued indebtedness to oil marketers concerning the payment of fuel transportation costs, otherwise called bridging claims. The Chairman of IPMAN in Suleja, Yahaya Alhassan, said marketers had stopped the supply of products from the depot.

item.title: Naira Continues To Fall At Official Market Despite CBN Interventions
item.description: The value of the Naira continues to fall against the US dollar at the official market despite many interventions by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN). The data showed that the value of the transaction at the market dropped by 49.6 percent or $62.99 million to $64.

item.title: Top Nigerian Newspaper Headlines For Today, Monday, 26th June, 2023
item.description: Good morning Nigeria, welcome to Naija News roundup of top newspaper headlines in Nigeria for today, Monday, 26th June 2023 Former Speaker of the House of Representatives, Yakubu Dogara, has encouraged President Bola Ahmed Tinubu to confront the so-called “subsidy cabals” head-on. He commended the President’s recent decision to remove fuel subsidy as an excellent move but emphasized the need for Tinubu to use his powers to recover any misappropriated funds.

item.title: Cream Cheese Supplies Are Spreading Thin as Holiday Shoppers Panic Why Is There a Shortage?
item.description: Holiday shoppers are in a panic about a sudden cream cheese shortage that is sweeping the nation. Why is there a cream cheese shortage? What we know. Source: Getty ImagesThroughout the coronavirus pandemic, many shoppers have encountered product shortages. Shortages so far have included everything from books to microchips for electronics to running shoes. Sadly, the latest product shortage to (not) hit shelves is cream cheese. Many holiday bakers are panicking, as cream cheese is a featured ingredient in lots of staple dishes like cheesecake.

item.title: Niko katika hatua za kuacha uraibu wa kunywa pombe kupindukia mpwa wa Uhuru afichua
item.description: -Nana Gecaga amedai kuwa anaendelea na hatua za kuacha uraibu wa kunywa pombe kupita kiasi -Alisema kuwa huo ulikuwa uamuzi wake alioufanya akiwa mchanga kwa msaada na marafiki wachache -Kulingana na Nana, aliweza kunywa kreti nzima ya bia kwa siku moja Mpwa wa Rais Uhuru Kenyatta Nana Wanjiru Gecaga alifichua Jumapili, Aprili 8 kuwa alikuwa na mazoea ya kunywa pombe kupita kiasi na kuwa alikuwa katika hatua za kuwacha kunywa pombe kabisa.

item.title: President Tinubu Decorates Military Chiefs With New Ranks [Photos]
item.description: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu on Monday decorated the Chief of Defense Staff, Maj Gen Christopher Musa and the service chiefs with their new ranks. Others being decorated are Maj Gen Taoreed Lagbaja Chief of Army Staff; Rear Admiral Emmanuel Ogalla, Chief of Naval Staff; and Air Vice Marshall Hassan Abubakar, Chief of Air Staff. Their new ranks are: Chief of Defence Staff (CDS), General Christopher Musa; Chief of Army Staff (COAS), Lt-General Taoreed Lagbaja; Chief of Air Staff (CAS), Air Marshal Hassan Abubakar, and Chief of Naval Staff (CNS), Vice Admiral Emmanuel Ogalla.

item.title: APC Governors Meet Rashidi Ladoja In Ibadan
item.description: Three Governors elected on the platform of the All Progressives Congress(APC) on Sunday paid a visit to a former Oyo Governor, Rashidi Ladoja, at his Ibadan residence. Though details of the discussion were still sketchy as at the time of filing this report, sources claimed the meeting was aimed at bringing the politician to the ruling APC. It was gathered that as soon as the visitors arrived at Ladoja’s residence, a closed-door meeting started, TheNation reports.

item.title: Atikus Ex-Aide, Sowunmi Drags PDP NWC To Court
item.description: Segun Sowunmi, a former spokesman of ex-vice President Atiku Abubakar, has dragged the National Working Committee (NWC) of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) to court for failing to convene a National Executive Council (NEC) meeting. Sowunmi filed the case at the Federal High Court in Abuja on Monday. Listed as respondents in the suit numbered FHC/ABJ/CS/ T024 are the PDP, the party’s acting national chairman, Iliya Damagum, national secretary, Samuel Anyanwu, National Organising Sec.

item.title: How Long Does It Actually Take to Reach the Titanic? The Sunken Ship Still Fascinates Many
item.description: How long does it take to get down to the Titanic? A submersible from OceanGate has gone missing during a research mission. Here's what we know. Source: Getty ImagesWhen the Titanic began its fateful voyage on April 10, 1912, it was hailed as being an unsinkable ship. This could not have been further from the truth as five days later, the massive vessel sunk after striking an iceberg. Out of the 2,224 people on board, only a little more than 1,500 would survive.

item.title: Julia Child - Trivia, Family, Bio
item.description: American chef who brought a love of French cuisine to TV viewers through her show The French Chef, which aired from 1963 to 1973. She also wrote the famous cookbook Mastering the Art of French Cooking. Before Fame After graduating from Smith College, she worked as an advertising copywriter for the New York home decor firm W. & J. Sloane. Trivia She studied at the prestigious Le Cordon Bleu in Paris and also learned directly under master chefs such as Max Bugnard.

item.title: Shauna Robertson (Blogger) - Age, Family, Bio
Jay-Z Latest News and Updates
item.description: Rapper, businessman, and media mogul Jay-Z is known as one of the most influential artists in hip-hop history. The New York native released his first studio album "Reasonable Doubt" in 1996 and has since released twelve more albums including "The Blueprint" (2001), "Watch the Throne" (2011), and "4:44" (2017). He has sold over 50 million albums worldwide and won 23 Grammys, the most by any rapper. Along with music, Jay-Z launched his clothing line Rocawear in 1999, and in 2003 opened his luxury sports bar chain 40/40 Club.

item.title: Ondo State Leaders Endorse Olusola Oke For Governor
item.description: In a significant development ahead of the upcoming November governorship election in Ondo State, notable leaders from Akure South, Ondo East, and Ifedore council areas have thrown their support behind Olusola Oke‘s candidacy. This endorsement comes at a crucial time, with the leaders asserting that Chief Oke possesses the qualities and experience that Ondo State requires for its next governor amid the current socio-political climate. During a meeting in Akure, the state capital, with Chief Oke’s campaign team, the leaders voiced their belief in Oke’s capabilities as a unifier and an administrator with a deep understanding of the state’s political landscape.

item.title: What Happened to Swatch From Project Runway? The Beloved Boston Terrier Passed Away
item.description: Swatch has been a beloved part of 'Project Runway' from the beginning, but fans were concerned about him in 2022. So, what happened to Swatch? Source: TwitterSince Project Runway first aired on Bravo in December 2004, the series has constantly evolved with time. Over the years, Project Runway changed its competitors, judges, hosts, and even networks. Nonetheless, the show's core purpose remains the same, as hopeful designers enter the competition for a chance at changing their careers forever.

item.title: With Three Days To INEC's Deadline Left, Kwankwaso, Sowores Names Missing
item.description: A former Kano State Governor, Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso, who is the presidential candidate of NNPP and Omoyele Sowore, who is the candidate of the AAC, are yet to upload their nominations for the 2023 presidential election. Naija News reports that this was made known in a statement on Wednesday by the Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC). INEC National Commissioner in charge of Information and Voter Education Committee, Festus Okoye, said the New Nigeria Peoples Party and the African Action Congress still have three days for the nomination of candidates for the election.

item.title: 'Batwoman' Just Cast Gabriel Mann as One of the Coolest DC Villains
item.description: Gabriel Mann Is Playing Tommy Elliott, Aka the Coolest 'Batwoman' Villain EverBy Mustafa GatollariUpdated Oct. 20 2019, 10:35 a.m. ET Source: gettyCW's Batwoman may be getting skewered by audience reviews on Rotten Tomatoes, and while I'll admit that the DC-universe shows on the network often contain cringeworthy moments, there's something about the Ruby Rose-led program that's got me very excited, and that's the announcement that Tommy Elliott will not only be a major character in Batwoman, but that he's being played by Gabriel Mann from Revenge.

item.title: Alexandre Mourreau - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Collector of Art, Supercars, and Watches who has collaborated with brands such as Bugatti, Aston Martin, Lamborghini, and Rolls-Royce. item.title: Expert Forecasts Worse Inflation Indices, Tougher Times Ahead
item.description: As Nigeria’s inflation rate rose to a new 17-year high of 22.79 per cent in June 2023, experts have forecasted worse indices in months ahead with the latest fuel hike. Naija News reported on Tuesday that the Nigerian National Petroleum Company (NNPC) Limited (NNPCL) announced a new hike in the pump price of petrol. This price hike, announced on Tuesday, comes in the wake of President Bola Tinubu’s removal of fuel subsidy on May 29th.

item.title: Hair Regime: Why the need for different strength hair relaxers
item.description: For a long time now, people have used women's hair to gauge their beauty standards and class. There are so many ways that women have adopted to ensure that they look good but relaxing their hair is the most done. READ ALSO: TZ actress Shilole confesses to bathing young lover everyday READ ALSO: 13 jaw-dropping photos of gorgeous actress Serah Teshna giving men sleepless nights Chemical hair relaxers are designed to straighten extremely curly, coiled or tightly coiled hair by breaking the di-sulfide bonds found within the cortex layer of the hair.

item.title: Shettima, Abiodun, Sanwo-Olu Attend Akeredolus Funeral Service
item.description: The town of Owo, Ondo State, is currently observing the commencement of the funeral rites for its esteemed former Governor, Oluwarotimi Akeredolu, who passed away on Wednesday, December 27, 2023, at the age of 67. The ceremony began at St. Andrews Church, located on Imola Street, marking the start of a series of events planned to honor the late governor’s memory. Oluwarotimi Akeredolu, a prominent figure in Ondo State’s political and social spheres, left an indelible mark through his contributions to the development and welfare of the state during his tenure.

item.title: Jonathan Asks Nnamdi Kanu, Sunday Igboho To Join APC
item.description: Following last week’s red carpet reception accorded former Minister of Aviation, Femi Fani-Kayode at the Aso Villa for defecting to the ruling party, an All Progressives Congress (APC) chieftain in Niger State, Jonathan Vatsa has encouraged separatist leaders, Nnamdi Kanu and Sunday Ighoho to defect to the APC and have their ‘sins’ forgiven. Naija News reports that Jonathan, who was the spokesman of the APC in the state, said it is “shocking and embarrassing” that those who were branded “looters” of the country’s treasury are being given “red carpet reception” at the Presidential Villa, adding that this has further put to question the anti-corruption stand of the present administration.

item.title: Buhari Presents Award To Police Officer For Rejecting $200,000 Bribe
item.description: President Muhammadu Buhari on Tuesday presented an award to an officer of the Nigeria Police Force for rejecting a mouthwatering bribe offered to him to drop an important criminal case. The celebrated officer, Superintendent Daniel Itse Amah was said to have recently rejected the sum of $200,000 offered to him to drop a armed robbery case. Amah, however, reportedly rejected the offer and proceeded with the investigations and eventually had the culprits apprehended and prosecuted.

item.title: IPOB To 'Totally Lockdown' Southeast For One Month If...
item.description: The Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) has stated that it would totally lockdown the southeast if the Department of State Services, DSS, refuses to bring it’s leader to court. Naija News reports that the trial of Nnamdi Kanu at the Abuja High Court is expected to continue on October 7th, 2021. In a statement on Wednesday through its spokesperson, Emma Powerful, IPOB stated that it would lockdown the whole region from October 21 if Kanu is not produced in court.

item.title: Mosun Filani Loses Dad - Legit.ng
item.description: Popular Yoruba actress, Mosun Filani has lost her father. The deceased, Olatunde Filani was said to have died after a brief illness. Kemi Filani reports that the deceased who was born in 1946, recently retired as a lecturer from the College of Education, Ikere Ekiti. The retired lecturer who worked for several years was a native of Ikole Ekiti and was said to have been instrumental in the training of several students who are today doing well either in the teaching profession or in other areas of human endeavor.

item.title: Sanwo-Olu Supports Tinubus Presidential Ambition
item.description: Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu of Lagos State has backed the National Leader of All Progressives Congress (APC), Bola Tinubu, to succeed President Muhammadu Buhari in 2023. According to Sanwo-Olu, the former Lagos governor has the quality to lead the nation and follow in the footsteps of President Buhari. He made the remark at the official launch of a campaign group, Southwest Agenda for Asiwaju, SWAGA’23, held in Ikeja, Lagos. In his address, governor Sanwo-Olu praised members of the group for their doggedness, action, vision and commitment to the cause.

PDP Appoints Ekwunife As Ozigbo's Campaign DG
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, has announced Senator Uche Ekwunife as Director General of its campaign council for the November 6, governorship election in Anambra. Ekwunife had placed third in the primary election that produced Chief Valentine Ozigbo as the PDP flagbearer in the governorship race. Speaking after a reconciliation meeting with aggrieved aspirants who contested the party’s ticket but failed to clinch it, the Governor of Adamawa State, Ahmadu Fintiri, said Ekwunife was unanimously picked for the job by stakeholders.

item.title: House of Reps hearing of Stella Oduah has started; she is absent
item.description: The House of Representatives committee on Aviation has begun hearing on the alleged purchase of two BMW cars for N255million for Minister of Aviation Princess Stella Oduah.  The hearing, proposed to start at noon, started 25 minutes later, PremiumTimes' National Assembly correspondent reports from the hearing room. However, Oduah is absent at the hearing: It has been reported she has been still on her way from Israel. The Committee directed her to appear before it tomorrow, Thursday, by 10 a.

item.title: Wike Reveals 'Candidate' He Will Support For PDP Presidential Ticket
item.description: Rivers State Governor, Nyesom Wike has revealed that he will only support a person who is prepared to lead and not just bear the title of ‘president’ to emerge as the 2023 presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP). He added that whoever would emerge as the 2023 presidential candidate of the PDP must be ready to confront the ‘evil’ called APC. This is as he predicted that there will be turbulence in the PDP for the presidential candidate of the party to emerge.

item.title: Fani-Kayode A Beggar, Featherweight And Political Liability
item.description: The Peoples Democratic Party in the South-West has congratulated the All Progressives Congress, APC, over the defection of former Aviation Minister, Femi Fani-Kayode. Naija News recalls that Fani-Kayode on Thursday officially left the PDP to the APC, a move that did not come as a surprise to Nigerians following his meetings with chieftains of the ruling party. Speaking after his defection, the former Minister had stated that he was led by the Spirit of God to join the APC, adding that his previous attack on President Muhammadu Buhari was only political.

item.title: Holiday Potluck Ideas That Still Follow Social Distance Guidelines
item.description: It's the holiday season, and if you're missing out on your annual potluck, we've got some ideas to have a safe holiday potluck together. Source: GettyIt's the holidays, and usually, this time of the year is filled with get-togethers with family and friends — but thanks to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, this holiday season looks a lot different. Each state, county, and even city has different guidelines for how they suggest you handle any travel or get together plans this season, but the CDC recommends you consider the number of COVID cases in your vicinity and potential travel exposure before gathering in person.

item.title: What Was Emilio Delgado's Cause of Death? The Star of 'Sesame Street' Passed Away
item.description: Emilio Delgado, the Actor and Singer Who Played Luis on 'Sesame Street,' Has Died at Age 81By Leila KozmaPublished March 11 2022, 9:36 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesThe star who portrayed Luis on Sesame Street has passed away at age 81. Emilio Delgado, the Calexico-born, Mexicali-raised actor best recognized for his work on hit TV shows like Lou Grant, Law & Order, and Sesame Street, died on March 10, 2022. A pioneering creative who paved the way for the next generation of Latinx actors, Emilio provided much-needed representation for young kids long before conversations about diversity began.

item.title: Boko Haram Kill JTF Commander, Maliya
item.description: A top commander of the Civilian Joint Task Force, Ibrahim Maliya has been killed by Boko Haram fighters after a recent bombing along Biu-Damboa Road in Borno State, Northeast Nigeria. It was gathered that Maliya before his death was supportive to security agencies in their fight against terrorism and other insecurity related issues rocking southern Borno. A chieftain of the Peoples Democratic Party, Kudla Milinda, while reacting to his death, condoled with the people of Biu local government area.

item.description: Operatives of Abia State Police Command on Tuesday arrested one Adaeze Lawrence who lives at Amaogbonna Road, off Osisikakwu street in Aba for the alleged abduction of a one-month-old infant. item.title: Over 400 Kenyans Are Operating Offshore Accounts, EACC Report
item.description: EACC divulged that at least 400 government officers opened offshore accounts over the last decadeThis was after the 12th Parliament diluted the principle which barred state officials from maintaining a bank account outside KenyaParliament enacted the Leadership and Integrity Act with exemptions that allowed state officials to operate such accounts under conditions stipulated in the Act, including seeking clearance from EACCThe Ethics and Anti-Corruption Commission (EACC) has revealed that more than 400 Kenyans have offshore accounts.

item.title: APC Strike Again, Accuse Fani-Kayode Of Distorting Facts

item.title: #EndSARS: Recovered Bullets From Lekki Shooting Match That Of Nigerian Army
item.description: A forensics company, Sentinel Forensic Limited, has confirmed that bullets expelled from firearms during the #EndSARS protest at the Lekki Toll Gate on October 20, 2020, match that of the Nigerian Army. The company’s representative, Joseph Kayode Funsho, disclosed on Friday while testifying before the Judicial Panel of Inquiry and Restitution set up to unravel details of the shooting. According to Funsho, the live bullets were discovered to have been the same calibre as the Nigerian Army’s Live Ammunition.

item.title: Ondo Assembly Confirms Adelami As Deputy Governor
item.description: The Ondo State House of Assembly on Thursday, conducted a screening and confirmation process for Olayide Adelami as the Deputy Governor of Ondo State. This decision followed the nomination by Governor Lucky Aiyedatiwa, who submitted Adelami’s name to the Assembly for approval just 24 hours prior. The confirmation took place during the Assembly’s plenary session, where the House selection committee, led by Speaker Olamide Oladij, considered and endorsed the nominee based on their report.

item.description: Some economic experts have said that Nigeria’s economy cannot withstand the current adjustment of fuel subsidy to N4trillion by the Federal Government. item.title: Governor Shettima Believes Boko Haram To Extend To South If They Overrun North
item.description: Governor of Borno State, Kashim Shettima, on Tuesday, June 10, stated that the Boko Haram would probably extend their influence to the South if they succeeded in overrunning the North-East. Speaking at a two-day conference on security and human rights organised by the Centre for Historical Documentation and Research of the Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria, the governor told: "If Boko Haram succeeds in overrunning the North East as they seek, they will surely want to extend greater havoc to other parts of the north and if they overrun the north, they would want to extend to the south.

item.title: Atiku, Nyako Get APC Membership Cards
item.description: On Wednesday, former Vice President Atiku Abubakar and Adamawa State Governor Murtala Nyako formally registered as members of the All Progressives Congress, obtaining membership cards. Both Nyako and Abubakar registered at their respective wards in Mayo-Belwa and Jada local government areas of Adamawa State, urging party supporters to registrate, too. They were registered by the National Registration Officer of the party in Adamawa, Alhaji Musa Umar. The two lawmakers described the excercise as a giant step in consolidating the APC's rising popularity in Nigeria.

item.title: Exchange Rate Of Euro To Naira Black Market Today
item.description: The Euro to Naira exchange rate in Nigeria’s black market has soared to ₦1,667.298 as of today, March 20, 2024, reflecting a significant appreciation of the European currency against the Nigerian Naira. Over the past year, the Euro has gained at least 46% in value when compared to the Naira, indicating substantial fluctuations in the foreign exchange sector. In the parallel market, also known as the black market, the exchange rate for the Euro showcases the informal sector’s dynamics, driven largely by supply and demand factors rather than official central bank rates.

item.title: Hakken - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Cosplayer who has gained prominence on social media. Their stylish anime-inspired modeling photos on Instagram have helped them gain more than 3.3 million followers.  Before Fame They posted their first photo to Instagram in April 2017. Trivia They are active on Facebook, posting cosplay content for more than 550,000 followers. They traveled to Italy in November 2019. Family Life They were born and raised in Malaysia originally. Associated With They have cosplayed with Ely Cosplay and featured their looks on Instagram.

item.title: Marilyn Monroe Had Two Siblings Who Were They?
item.description: Did Marilyn Monroe have any siblings growing up? These are some of the mysterious details people should know about Marilyn and her family. Source: Getty ImagesThe '50s was the era when Marilyn Monroe became one of the most noteworthy actresses ever. She landed major films including Gentlemen Prefer Blondes in 1953 and The Seven Year Itch in 1955. By the time the '60s came around though, things turned incredibly tragic. She passed away at the age of 36 — and there are endless conspiracies surrounding her untimely death.

item.title: MP Richard Onyonka says he left Rutos camp because of DP's constant attacks on Uhuru, Raila
item.description: - Onyanka was a close ally of Ruto and was the chairman of his Tanga Tanga faction in Kisii county - The two leaders later parted ways and the MP has disclosed he was tired of DP's attacks on President Uhuru Kenyatta and Raila Odinga - The vocal politician has since embraced the handshake and turned into a Ruto critic A visibly vexed Kitutu Chache South MP Richard has claimed he parted ways with Deputy President William Ruto because of his endless attacks on President Uhuru Kenyatta and ODM leader Raila Odinga.

item.title: I knew PDP Would Not Give The Presidential Ticket To An Igbo Man Umahi Demands Apology
item.description: Governor of Ebonyi state, Dave Umahi has demanded an apology from some members of the Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, who criticized him when he dumped the party two years ago. Naija News recalls that former All Progressives Congress presidential aspirant dumped the PDP for APC on November 17, 2020. Sharing his ordeal during an interview on Arise TV, the governor said that those who were angered by his defection are now crying.

item.title: Kwankwaso Not Stoned In Kogi Campaign Group
item.description: Viral claims that the presidential candidate of the New Nigeria People’s Party (NNPP), Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso was attacked in Kogi State have been faulted by his campaign organisation. Reports had emerged earlier that the former Governor of Kano State who visited Kogi for the inauguration of the party’s secretariat and campaign office, was booed and stoned by some hoodlums, Naija News reports. It was claimed in the report that the presidential hopeful was also stoned with sachets of water in Lokoja, the state capital.

item.title: What Does the Ninja Emoji Mean? It's Being Used In Place of a Slur on TikTok
item.description: The ninja emoji is circulating on TikTok, but some users are unclear on what the emoji means and what it's being used in place of. Source: EmojipediaThankfully, TikTok and other social media apps have been smart about curtailing hate speech and other offensive forms of speech that are used on their platforms. Unfortunately, even as apps like TikTok attempt to censor certain kinds of horrible speech, those who want to use it find ways around these filters.

item.title: Xavier Prather and Kyland Young Almost Fought Over Comments About Xavier's Nephew
item.description: Xavier Prather's nephew, Kobe, became the subject of a heated discussion in a recent 'Big Brother' episode. Who said what to whom? Read on for more. Source: CBSA recent episode of Big Brother captured a heated scene between Xavier Prather and Kyland Young, two contestants who already struck up a final two deal. Xavier, Azäh Awasum, and Derek Frazier eliminated Kyland on the live eviction episode on Thursday, Sept. 23, 2021, and the decision quickly gave way to a fervid conflict.

item.title: Argument Over Splitting $5K Birthday Dinner Bill Goes Viral
item.description: An Argument Among Friends Over Splitting a $5K Birthday Dinner Bill Goes ViralBy Tatayana YomaryPublished July 18 2023, 2:35 p.m. ET Source: TikTok/@viccgottiAnother day, another social media debate about splitting the bill. It’s common for some folks at a birthday dinner to split the bill among the group — with the birthday person being exempt from the bill. After all, everyone is coming together to celebrate the birthday person and it’s customary for the guest of honor to not contribute.

Only PDP Can Save Nigeria
item.description: Governor Godwin Obaseki of Edo State has declared that only the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) can rescue Nigeria and place it on the path of economic prosperity and sustainable development. Obaseki stated this when he received members of Atiku Support Group, led by Chief Raymond Dokpesi, who were on a courtesy visit at the Government House, Benin City. According to him, “If Nigeria is going to be salvaged, PDP has to step into the throne to salvage this country politically.

item.title: Soccer Legend Peter Crouch's Kids Have Blossomed Before Our Eyes
item.description: Home > Entertainment > Celebrity > Celebrity RelationshipsPeter Crouch and Abbey Clancy have a growing family, complete with cute kids to boot. Here is everything we know about the family unit. You may know Peter Crouch and Abbey Clancy for their illustrious careers and wildly good looks. The soccer legend and the model-TV star are proudly married and are also parents to four adorable kiddos. Article continues below advertisementThe dynamic duo also host a podcast called The Therapy Crouch, where they've opened up about their unique approaches to parenting.

item.title: Bayelsa Commissioner Abducted By Unknown Gunmen
item.description: The Bayelsa State Commissioner for Trade and Commerce, Otokito Federal Oparmiola, has been reportedly kidnapped by unknown gunmen. Naija News learned that Oparmiola was abducted from his room around 11 pm on Thursday during an invasion of his residence at Otuokpoti community, Ogbia Local Government Area of the state. The commissioner was, however, whisked away to an unknown destination. Before the abduction of the commissioner, the armed gunmen had fired several shots to announce their arrival and to scare the residents of the community away.

item.title: Ben Barlow - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Lead vocalist of the Welsh pop punk band Neck Deep who performs alongside Lloyd Roberts, Matt West, Fil Thorpe-Evans and Dani Washington. Before Fame The band formed in 2012 after starting out as a bedroom project between him and Lloyd Roberts. Trivia He and the band released their first studio album called Wishful Thinking in 2014. Family Life He grew up with two older brothers. He left his band's 2016 tour due to his father's passing.

item.title: Boko Haram Attacks, Burn Down Military Base In Borno
item.description: The Islamic State of West Africa Province (ISWAP) wing of jihadist fighters Boko Haram have reportedly attacked a military formation in Borno. The attack occurred Tuesday evening at Kwamdi village in Damboa Local Government Area (LGA) of the state, DailyTrust reports. The daring terrorists stormed the military formation in 10 utility vehicles and carted away weapons. The ISWAP fighters also set ablaze some military equipment after a gun duel with the troops.

item.title: Buratai Speaks On Joining Tinubu, Atiku, Okorocha, Others To Vie For 2023 Presidency
item.description: A former Chief of Army Staff and Nigeria’s Ambassador to Benin Republic, Lt.-Gen. Tukur Buratai (Rtd), has denied planning to contest the 2023 presidential election despite campaign posters. In a statement signed by the former spokesman of the Nigerian Army, Brig.-Gen. Sani Usman (Rtd), Buratai said he has never indicated interest, discussed with or directed anyone to campaign for him. While urging on Nigerians to ignore such calls and posters, the former Army chief said he is not willing to go into partisan politics.

item.title: Sofia Bryant - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Television actress known for her portrayal of Dina on the original Netflix series I Am Not Okay with This. She has also made appearances on Blue Bloods and The Good Wife. Before Fame In 2015, she lent her voice to the animated film Birdboy: The Forgotten Children.  Trivia She guest starred on a 2019 episode of The Code. Family Life In December 2019, she made an Instagram post wishing her younger brother a happy birthday. Associated With She starred alongside Sophia Lillis and Wyatt Oleff on I Am Not Okay with This.

item.title: 'Game of Thrones' Fans Aren't Happy That Jon Didn't Pet Ghost In Season 8 Episode 4
item.description: 'Game of Thrones' Fans Aren't Happy That Jon Didn't Pet Ghost In Episode 4By Mark PygasUpdated May 13 2019, 8:24 p.m. ET Source: HBOWhen we watch Game of Thrones, we usually ask who's going to win the Iron Throne. We don't ask who deserves the Iron Throne. There's no question that Jon Snow's direwolf Ghost has definitely been a good boy this season and deserves his own Iron Throne pet bed.

item.title: 'Totally Insensitive' - Atedo Peterside Slams Akpabio Over Comments At Wigwe's Burial
item.description: Atedo Peterside, president and founder of Anap Foundation, has slammed the President of the Nigerian Senate, Godswill Akpabio, for his comments at the final burial ceremony of the late CEO of Access Bank, Herbert Wigwe. Naija News recalls that the Senate president had come under fire for the drama he pulled off at the bank chief’s burial ceremony. Akpabio, on Saturday, tackled Governor Siminalayi Fubara of Rivers State over comments made at the funeral of the former Chief Executive Officer of Access Holdings, Herbert Wigwe, his wife and son.

item.title: 2023: 'You Have A Rare Opportunity, But You Look For Ways To Thwart It'
item.description: Media personality, Frank Edoho has slammed Igbo politicians working against the presidential bid of Labour Party flag bearer, Peter Obi.  This comes shortly after the former Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Chukwuma Charles Soludo, who currently serves as the Governor of Anambra State, berated Obi’s performance while he was a governor, stating that the investment Obi left in government is worth next to nothing today. In another explosive publication on Monday, Soludo tackled the presidential candidate, saying he can’t win the 2023 presidential election.

item.title: GAT Summit 2022: Lagos State Creating And Encouraging Innovations
item.description: Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu of Lagos State has said that his government has been working and rolling out policies aimed at creating and encouraging innovations in the state. Naija News reports that the Lagos State governor made this known on Thursday while speaking at the Government And Tech (GAT) Summit 2022 held at the Oriental Hotel, Lagos State. Representing Sanwo-Olu, the Lagos State Governor Special Adviser on Innovation and Technology, Olatubosun Alake said that the present administration is determined to usher into the fourth industrial revolution and become a tech hub on the continent .

item.title: What Happened to Bloxy Burgers in Bloxburg? Explained
item.description: Unexpectedly, the well-known Bloxy Burgers in Bloxburg caught on fire and burned down. Players have theories about why this happened — here's what we learned. Within the popular Roblox game Welcome to Bloxburg, players can find many establishments in the fictional city of Bloxburg, like Green Clean and the Stylez Hair Studio. Players can enter these businesses and work as Hairdressers, Janitors, and more to fulfill various services for the NPC customers coming and going.

item.title: The Season 1 Finale of 'Sweet Magnolias' Was a Real Nail-Biter and We Need Answers Now
item.description: We are still freaking out about the last few minutes of the 'Sweet Magnolias' Season 1 car accident finale. Who is in the car with Kyle? Source: NetflixIt's pretty hard not to love Netflix's Sweet Magnolias, which is based on the book series of the same name. It has all the idyllic things we look for in a drama: die-hard friendships, romance, a picturesque small town, and margaritas. And as fans gearing up for Season 2 will recall, the Season 1 finale even tossed in a little danger.

item.title: You Can't Stop Nigerians From Speaking Against Bad Government
item.description: A human rights activist, Paul Njoku, has stated that the presidential candidate of the Labor Party (LP), Peter Obi, has no right to stop Nigerians from expressing their dissatisfaction with the state of the nation. Recall that Naija News earlier reported that the LP flagbearer had some weeks back warned his supporters against responding to any politician or presidential candidate that makes comments about him. Obi had written: “I most sincerely appreciate all my supporters and those of LP.

item.title: 13 Oldest Sibling Problems All Firstborns Can Relate To
item.description: 13 Problems Firstborn Siblings Can Relate ToBy Amber GarrettUpdated June 28 2019, 3:20 p.m. ET Source: iStockThere have been plenty of studies about birth order, with a lot of argument about how much it affects your personality if at all. But even if there's no real consensus on the traits firstborn children might exhibit, there are definitely experiences that are almost universal for older siblings. As the eldest kid in my family, I admit we have a few advantages — like being the only ones who get to experience being an only child for at least a few years — it's not always a picnic.

item.title: Armando Rubio (TikTok Star) - Age, Family, Bio
Fast Begins As Moon Is Spotted In Saudi Arabia
item.description: The crescent moon has been spotted in Saudi Arabia, signalling the commencement of the 2024 Ramadan fast for Muslims. This was disclosed in a tweet by Inside the Haramain, a Saudi Arabia-based news outlet, on Sunday, March 10. The sighting of the moon implies the 2024 Ramadan fast would kick off on Monday, 11th March. Meanwhile, Nigerians are still expecting an update from the Sultan of Sokoto regarding when the 2024 Ramadan fast will kick off in Nigeria.

item.title: Joshua Osei - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Well known to fans of Just Kidding Films for his more than twenty appearances on the popular YouTube channel, he is also a movie actor with credits in Ill Manors, Vendetta and Life Just Is. Before Fame He began his acting career in 2007 and first debuted on television in 2010 in an episode of The Bill. Trivia He played the Jake in a 2012 television mini-series called One Night. Family Life His aunt Rita Osei is a writer, director and producer.

item.title: Adil Rami - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Center back who played for Lille from 2007 to 2011 and Valencia from 2011 to 2014. He became a member of the French national team in 2010 and helped the team win the 2018 World Cup.  Before Fame He debuted professionally for Frejus in 2003 after spending about a decade in the club's youth system. Trivia He was sent on loan to A.C. Milan in 2014. Family Life He was born in Bastia, France.

item.title: Louis Bacon - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known as the founder of the New York-based Moore Capital Management hedge fund, this billionaire entrepreneur had previously established the Remington Trading Partners company. Also a philanthropist for environmental causes, he founded The Moore Charitable Foundation and donated to a non-profit group called Riverkeeper. Before Fame After earning a degree in American literature from Middlebury College (Vermont), he earned a Master of Business Administration from the Columbia University Business School.

item.title: Marsai Martin - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Best known for her breakthrough and television debut as Diane Johnson on the ABC sitcom Black-ish. She starred in the 2019 black comedy Little. Before Fame Upon moving to Los Angeles in 2013, she landed a major national commercials with Meineke. Trivia Her parents took her to an agency in Dallas who signed her at the age of five. She earned a producing credit on the film Little, which earned her a Guinness World Records title for the youngest Hollywood executive producer ever.

item.title: Was Susan Wojcicki a Smoker? Former YouTube CEO Dies From Lung Cancer
item.description: Susan Wojcicki Dies at Age 56 From Lung Cancer — Was Smoking a Factor?Susan Wojcicki's death comes just six months after her 19-year-old son overdosed in his dorm room. By Anna QuintanaPublished Aug. 10 2024, 10:31 a.m. ET Source: Getty ImagesFormer YouTube CEO Susan Wojcicki has tragically passed away at the age of 56. Her husband, Dennis Troper, shared the sad news on Facebook on August 10, writing, "It is with profound sadness that I share the news of Susan Wojcicki's passing.

item.title: 2023: 'Atiku Can Go To Hell'
item.description: The Governor of Benue State, Samuel Ortom on Sunday noted that he would not be supporting the presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar. Ortom said he would not support Atiku who is not concerned about the continuous killings of the Benue people. The Benue State Governor while lamenting the killing of people in his local government last week said, “to hell with Atiku and anyone supporting him.

item.title: ASUU Threatens Fresh Strike, Accuse Buhari Govt Of Insincerity
item.description: University lecturers under the Academic Staff Union of Universities (ASUU) have threatened to embark on another strike action that will halt academic activities in public universities in Nigeria. According to ASUU, the union will not hesitate to resume its suspended strike action if the federal government continues to fail in honouring agreements between them. ASUU Chairperson of the Abubakar Tafawa Balewa University, Bauchi, Dr. Ibrahim Inuwa, made this known while speaking with some journalists at the Union’s Secretariat during the weekend.

item.title: Sylvia Earle - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Award-winning oceanographer and lecturer who became a National Geographic explorer-in-residence in 1998. She is also considered an expert on the impact of oil spills and has been called upon to lead several research teams during various spills. Before Fame She earned a bachelor of science degree from Florida State University in 1955 and later earned a master of science and doctorate of philosophy degree from Duke University. Trivia In 1998, Time Magazine named her its first Hero for the Planet.

Today, they’re all grown up. Maci, Amber, and Catelynn stayed on the show for more than a dozen seasons.

item.title: Davido Vows To Lead Protest In Abuja Tomorrow
item.description: Nigerian singer David Adeleke popularly known as Davido has promised to lead EndSARS protest. The singer in a tweet today, October 10, urged Nigerian youths to come out in masses, as he will be leading the End SARS campaign tomorrow in Abuja, October 11. Davido announced this on Twitter, as he wrote; “Abuja 2moro …. !!! Who with me??? #EndSarsNow ” Abuja 2moro …. !!! Who with me??? #EndSarsNow — Davido (@davido) October 10, 2020

item.title: Mom Asks Sons Girlfriend to Let Him Cheat as Birthday Gift
item.description: Mom Asks Son’s Girlfriend to Let Her Son Cheat for His 18th Birthday Gift in Viral TikTokBy Mustafa GatollariPublished Dec. 6 2022, 9:57 a.m. ET Source: GettyIt's always awkward whenever parents get involved in the particulars of your relationship. There are plenty of folks who think that their kids can do no wrong, and some are more than willing to inform their significant others of all the ways they're failing to meet their child's needs.

item.title: Security Operatives Arrest Two Notorious Robbers While Stealing From Church In Rivers State
item.description: The Rivers State command of the Nigeria Police Force has put in custody two individuals who were caught while trying to deface the iron on the fence surrounding Emmanuel Anglican Church, located in Okoro-Nu-Odo by Rumuokoro Roundabout in Obio-Akpor local government area of the state. Naija News learnt that the duo were nabbed by the security guards at the church around 2 am yesterday. According to reports, there was mild drama on the church premises while questioning the burglary suspects before they were eventually handed over to the police at approximately 9 am.

item.title: Sr Pelo - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Illustrator, animator, and graphic designer who publishes parodies of games, cartoons and TV series to his popular YouTube channel. He has earned more than 5 million subscribers. Before Fame After registering his YouTube channel with the username 123pendejos in May of 2008, he uploaded a first flash animation in August of 2011. Trivia He posted a four-part series of videos titled "Underpants." Each episode earned more than 5 million views.

item.title: Why US Cant Help Nigeria Fight Boko Haram, Bandits
item.description: A former US ambassador to Nigeria, John Campbell, has revealed the reason the United States Government will not support Nigeria in its war against terrorism and banditry. Speaking on Friday at the maiden edition of Grow Nigeria Conversation in Abuja, Campbell said the US govt will only offer technical and financial support to Nigeria until the government addresses alleged human rights abuses by the military and other security agencies. He asked the Muhammadu Buhari led-government to do its best to restore public confidence in the security forces, especially the police.

item.title: Anambra Governor Elect Charles Soludo Delivers First Speech
item.description: The winner of the just concluded Anambra Governorship Election, Chukwuma Charles Soludo has delivered his first speech after he was declared victorious by the Independent National Electoral Commission on Wednesday morning. The candidate of the All Progressives Grand Alliance accepted the final outcome of the polls which started on November 6 and ended on Tuesday, November 9, ascribing his victory in the 2021 Anambra Governorship Election as a reflection of the people’s will.

item.title: Jon Bernthal - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Played the role of Shane Walsh on AMC's zombie drama The Walking Dead and later became Frank on Marvel's The Punisher. He followed executive producer Frank Darabont to TNT's drama miniseries Mob City in 2013. His film credits include Fury, The Ghost Writer, and Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian. Before Fame He studied at The School of Moscow Art Theater in Russia.  Trivia He played professional baseball in the European leagues. Family Life In 2010, he married Erin Angle, the niece of Olympian Kurt Angle.

item.title: What Happens to Extra Wheels and Wheel Tokens in Monopoly Go?

item.title: X-Kryptonite Has Set the Stage for an Insane Season of 'Superman & Lois'
item.description: Lois recently discovered that Morgan Edge has been looking for X-Kryptonite, and this is a very, very bad thing. But what is X-Kryptonite, exactly? Source: The CWThanks to COVID-related production delays, we haven't had a new episode of Superman & Lois since March 23, which might mean you need a quick replay of the major action that went down last time you tuned in. Back in March, Arrowverse's Superman & Lois introduced X-Kryptonite, which could change everything, and set us up for a super crazy first season.

item.title: You Have Grown More Wings
item.description: The Oyo State chapter of the All Progressives Congress (APC) has lampooned Governor Seyi Makinde for criticizing the administration of President Bola Ahmed Tinubu over the current economic crisis as a result of the removal of subsidy on Premium Motor Spirit (PMS), also known as fuel or petrol. In a statement issued on Tuesday through its Publicity Secretary, Wasiu Olawale Sadare, APC said Makinde had grown more wings to have boldly criticised Tinubu’s leadership.

item.title: Full Details Of PDP Governors' Meeting In Abia
item.description: Governors elected under the platform of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) have condemned the recent fuel scarcity in the country and the incessant collapse of the national grid. The PDP governors slammed the All Progressives Congress (APC) for subjecting Nigerians to torture during the time the fuel scarcity and the national grid collapse lasted. In a communique issued after their meeting in Umuobiakwa, Abia State,  the governors described the Muhammadu Buhari-led government as uncaring and insensitive to the plight of Nigerians.

Naija News had earlier reported that a Court of Appeal in Abuja on Thursday struck out charges levelled against Nnamdi Kanu by the Federal Government. The Court of Appeal ruled that the Federal Government breached all local and international laws in the forceful rendition of Kanu to Nigeria, thereby making the terrorism charges against him incompetent and unlawful.

item.title: DSS Allays Fears Over Possible Terrorist Attack In Abuja
item.description: The Department of State Services (DSS) has asked Nigerians not to entertain fear over the possibility of a terrorist attack in Abuja. Naija News reports that the DSS was reacting to a security alert issued by the United States Embassy in Abuja and the UK Embassy over a possible terrorist attack in the city this week. In a statement on Sunday in Abuja, the US Embassy announced that it would offer reduced services until further notice and urged American citizens to avoid non-essential movements.
